s0256: Made covenant with them, released Confucius out the east gate.
s0258: Zi Gong said: 'Can covenants be broken?'
s0259: Confucius said: 'It was a forced covenant, the spirits do not accept it.'
s0261: Wei Ling Gong heard Confucius was coming, was pleased, welcomed him at the suburbs.
s0264: Ling Gong said: 'My ministers think it cannot.
s0265: Now Pu is what Wei uses to deal with Jin and Chu, to attack it with Wei, is it not impossible?'
s0266: Confucius said: 'Its men have the will to die, its women have the will to defend the west river.
s0267: Those I would attack are no more than four or five people.'
s0270: Ling Gong was old, neglected government affairs, did not employ Confucius.
s0271: Confucius sighed deeply: 'If someone would employ me, in one month there would be results, in three years achievement.'
s0273: Fo Xi was magistrate of Zhongmu.
s0274: Zhao Jian Zi attacked Fan and Zhong Xing, attacked Zhongmu.
s0275: Fo Xi rebelled, sent someone to summon Confucius.
s0277: Zi Lu said: 'I heard from the master, "Gentlemen do not enter where those who personally do evil are."
s0278: Now Fo Xi personally rebels with Zhongmu, master wishes to go, how is this?'
s0280: Does it not say firm, ground but not worn;
s0281: does it not say white, dyed but not blackened.
s0282: Am I a bitter gourd, how can I hang without being eaten?'
s0285: Someone carrying a hoe passed the gate, said: 'There is purpose here, playing the chime!
s0286: Clang clang, none know me, that's all!'
s0288: Confucius studied playing the lute with Master Xiang Zi, ten days without progressing.
s0289: Master Xiang Zi said: 'You can add to it.'
s0290: Confucius said: 'I have practiced the melody, but have not gotten its rhythm.'
s0291: After a while, said: 'Have practiced the rhythm, you can add to it.'
s0292: Confucius said: 'I have not gotten its intent.'
s0293: After a while, said: 'Have gotten the intent, you can add to it.'
s0294: Confucius said: 'I have not gotten the person.'
s0295: After a while, there was something solemn and deep in thought, something cheerful and gazing high with far-reaching ambition.
s0296: Said: 'I have gotten the person, dark and black, tall and long, eyes like gazing sheep, like ruling the four directions, who but King Wen could do this!'
s0297: Master Xiang Zi moved his mat and bowed twice, said: 'The master indeed said it is King Wen's piece.'
s0299: Confucius having been unable to be employed in Wei, was about to go west to see Zhao Jian Zi.
s0300: Reached the river and heard of Dou Ming Du and Shun Hua's deaths, by the river sighed: 'Beautiful indeed water, vast!
s0301: My not crossing this, it is fate!'
s0302: Zi Gong hurried forward: 'May I ask what this means?'
s0303: Confucius said: 'Dou Ming Du, Shun Hua, Jin's worthy ministers.
s0304: When Zhao Jian Zi had not yet achieved his ambitions, he depended on these two men then conducted affairs;
s0305: when he had achieved his ambitions, killed them then conducted affairs.
s0306: I have heard: cut open fetuses and kill the young, then qilin do not come to the suburbs;
s0307: drain ponds and dry up fisheries, then dragons do not harmonize yin and yang;
s0308: overturn nests and destroy eggs, then phoenixes do not soar.
